src:
Airlangga Bungkam Ditanya Soal Bamsoet Maju Jadi Ketum Golkar
05 Nov 2019, 23:20 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ketua Umum Partai Golkar Airlangga Hartarto. (CNN Indonesia/Andry Novelino)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Ketua Umum Partai Golkar Airlangga Hartanto 'bungkam' saat ditanya soal rencana Wakorbid Pratama Partai Golkar Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) yang mempertimbangkan maju sebagai kandidat Ketua Umum Partai Golkar periode 2019-2024 di forum Munas pada Desember 2019.Airlangga juga enggan berkomentar saat ditanyakan terkait komitmen Bamsoet yang pernah menyatakan ingin mendukungnya dan tak ingin maju di Munas tersebut."Itu saya tidak memberikan komentar," kata Airlangga di Kantor DPP Partai Golkar, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11).Bamsoet dan Airlangga belakangan terlibat rivalitas perebutan kursi calon Ketua Umum Golkar. Bamsoet dan Airlangga sama-sama tengah menggalang dukungan para kader Golkar untuk merebut kursi ketua umum partai beringin.Bamsoet diketahui tidak hadir dalam rapat pleno yang sudah digelar malam ini. Airlangga enggan ambil pusing tentang hal itu, ia mengatakan banyak pengurus DPP Golkar lainnya yang turut tak datang pada malam ini.Airlangga bilang pencalonan ketua umum Golkar nantinya akan dibahas dalam forum Munas."Yang tidak hadir selain Bamsoet ada yang tidak hadir juga," kata dia.Bamsoet yang kini menjabat Ketua MPR telah membantah dirinya punya perjanjian atau semacam komitmen dengan Airlangga mengenai pencalonan Ketua Golkar. "Emang pacaran pakai pengkhianatan? ini kan saya tidak sedang bercinta, tapi sedang berpolitik. Masa ada pengkhianatan-pengkhianatan?" kata Bamsoet pada Senin (4/11). (rzr/fea)
text:
Airlangga Mutes Questioning about Bamsoet Going Forward to become Golkar Chairperson
05 Nov 2019, 23:20 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Chairman of the Golkar Party Airlangga Hartarto. (CNN Indonesia / Andry Novelino)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Golkar Party Chairperson Airlangga Hartanto was 'silenced' when asked about the plan of the Golkar Party Primary Wakorbid Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) who was considering going forward as the Golkar Party Chairperson candidate for the 2019-2024 period at the National Conference forum in December 2019. "I did not comment," Airlangga said at the Golkar Party DPP Office, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5) .Bamsoet and Airlangga were later involved rivalry over the seats of the Golkar Chairperson candidates. Bamsoet and Airlangga are both gathering support from Golkar cadres to win the chair of the Banyan party party. Bassoet is known to be absent from the plenary meeting that has been held tonight. Airlangga was reluctant to bother with that, he said many other Golkar DPP officials who did not attend this evening. Nonangga said the nomination of the Golkar chairman would later be discussed at the National Conference forum. "Those who were absent besides Bamsoet were also absent," said he. Bansoet who now serves as Chairman of the MPR has denied he has an agreement or some kind of commitment with Airlangga regarding the nomination of the Golkar Chair. "Are you dating using betrayal? I am not making love, but I'm doing politics. How could there be betrayals?" Bamsoet said on Monday (4/11). (rzr / fea)
